<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cave Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=4450) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 57 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

After years of clambering through caverns, you can climb easily anywhere you go. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet.
name: Cave Climber
